page.title: 17ATTITUDES OF THE OFFLEY FOLK
page.content: People responding to the question on the form "What improvements to the village do you suggest"? gave a wide variety of responses.Several people wanted better shopping facilities in the village itself,others would like to have a Doctor's Surgery and some would like squash courts to be built.Many people felt that there should be many more things to occupy the youngsters in the village.Some of the teenagers tend to hang around the street corners and make a nuisance of themselves as there is little else to do- so they say. There were requests made for more help for the housebound,more street lights, more houses and some at prices young couples could afford,a main gas supply to the village and repair work to be carried out on the pavements which are uneven and broken.
